model_code:
def maxSum(nums):
    if not nums:
        return 0
    n = len(nums)
    prev = 0
    curr = nums[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        temp = curr
        curr = max(curr, prev + nums[i])
        prev = temp
    return curr
tests:
def test_maxSum():
    assert maxSum([3, 2, 5, 10, 7]) == 15
    assert maxSum([5, 5, 10, 100, 10, 5]) == 110
    assert maxSum([]) == 0
    assert maxSum([1, 2, 3]) == 4
    assert maxSum([-5, 10, -5, 10, -5]) == 20
    assert maxSum([5]) == 5
    assert maxSum([5, 3]) == 5
    assert maxSum([10, 5, 10]) == 20

test_maxSum()
